author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Gloria. Sy þe wuldor and lof      wide geopenod
text.1: geond ealle þeoda,      þanc and wylla,
text.2: mægen and mildse      and ealles modes lufu,
text.3: soðfæstra sib,      and ðines sylfes dom
text.4: worulde gewlitegod,      swa ðu wealdan miht
text.6: wind and wolcna.      Wealdest eall on riht.
text.8: þu eart frofra fæder      and feorhhyrde,
text.10: asyndrod fram synnum,      swa ðin sunu mære
text.11: þurh clæne gecynd,      cyning ofer ealle,
text.14: Sicut erat in principio. Swa wæs on fruman      frea mancynnes
text.16: clæne and cræftig.      þu gecyddest þæt
text.17: þa ðu, ece god,      ana gewrohtest
text.18: þurh halige miht      heofonas and eorðan,
text.19: eardas and uplyft      and ealle þing.
text.20: þu settest on foldan      swyðe feala cynna
text.21: and tosyndrodost hig      syððon on mænego;
text.22: þu gewrohtest, ece god,      ealle gesceafta
text.23: on syx dagum,      and on þone seofoðan þu gerestest.
text.24: þa wæs geforðad      þin fægere weorc,
text.26: and gemærsodest hine      manegum to helpe.
text.27: þone heahan dæg      healdað and freoðiaþ
text.28: ealle þa ðe cunnon      cristene þeawas,
text.30: on drihtnes namon      se dæg is gewurðod.
text.32: And nu and symble      þine soðan weorc
text.33: and ðin mycele miht      manegum swytelað,
text.34: swa þine cræftas heo      cyðaþ wide
text.36: godes handgeweorc,      groweð swa ðu hete.
text.39: eall middaneard,      and we men cweþað
text.40: on grunde her:      "Gode lof and ðanc,
text.41: ece willa,      and ðin agen dom!"
text.42: Et is secula seculorum. And on worulda woruld      wunað and rixað
text.43: cyning innan wuldre      and his þa gecorenan,
text.47: modes miltse.      þær is seo mæste lufu;
text.50: swa syndon þine mihta      ofer middangeard
text.51: swutele and gesyne,      þæt ðu hy sylf worhtest.
text.53: þurh clæne gecynd      þu eart cyning on riht,
text.54: clæne and cræftig.      þu gecyddest þæt
text.55: þa ðu, mihtig god,      man geworhtest
text.56: and him on dydest      oruð and sawul,
text.57: sealdest word and gewitt      and wæstma gecynd,
text.58: cyddest þine cræftas.      Swylc is Cristes miht!
